content: I am new here and this is my first post. Has the following ever been done or is it possible? A channel opened with the sole purpose of reviewing a mathematics article?
A message was moved here from #general > language server crash when editing by Riccardo Brasca.
Hi @Kajani Kaunda I just moved your message to the new members stream since it is more appropriate. Please try to open new thread if you have questions. Thanks and welcome!
Concerning your question, #Polynomial Freiman-Ruzsa conjecture did exactly that.

This has been done, in some sense, with #condensed mathematics and #Carleson etc...
But it depends very much on the paper in question. You'll have to provide more details.
@Kajani Kaunda Please do not double post.
